alert.note: Alert for Lafayette; Vermilion (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 08 at 10:44AM CDT until April 10 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Louisiana... Bayou Des Cannes Near Eunice Bayou Vermilion Near Carencro Vermilion River At Lafayette, Surrey Street Gage Mermentau River Near Mermentau ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Louisiana...Texas... Sabine River Near Deweyville ...The Flood Warning is cancelled for the following rivers in Louisiana...Texas... Bayou Anacoco Near Rosepine Neches River Near Town Bluff Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE MONDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Vermilion River At Lafayette, Surrey Street Gage. * WHEN...Until late Monday evening. * IMPACTS...At 10.0 feet, Minor flooding of Heymann Park off of Highway 90 will occur. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:15 AM CDT Saturday the stage was 10.7 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 10:15 AM CDT Saturday was 11.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is currently falling but is expected to rise to a secondary crest of 10.7 feet tomorrow morning. It will then fall below flood stage late Monday morning. - Flood stage is 10.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (1 pm CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Sun Mon Tue Vermilion River Lafayette, Surrey Street Gag 10.0 10.7 Sat 10 am CD 10.6 9.9 9.1 &&
